alert.note: Alert for Corson; Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 2:57AM MDT until May 12 at 3:45AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Corson County in north central South Dakota... Northeastern Dewey County in north central South Dakota... * Until 345 AM MDT. * At 257 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Little Eagle, or 14 miles south of Mclaughlin, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 250 AM MDT 69 mph winds were reported near Timber Lake. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wakpala and Mahto around 305 AM MDT. Kenel around 315 AM MDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
